pitchtools.get_interval_class_vector¶

abjad.tools.pitchtools.get_interval_class_vector(pitches)¶

Return the interval class vector of pitches as a Python dictionary.

The interval vector implemented here gives the number of i0, ..., i6 between the n**2 - n pairs of pitches taken without respect for order.

abjad> chord = Chord([0, 2, 11], (1, 4))
abjad> vector = pitchtools.get_interval_class_vector(chord.pitches)
abjad> for i in range(7):
...     print '\t%s\t%s' % (i, vector[i])
... 
   0  0
   1  1
   2  1
   3  1
   4  0
   5  0
   6  0
abjad> staff = Staff(construct.scale(4) + construct.scale(4) + construct.scale(4))
abjad> pitches = pitchtools.get_pitches(staff)
abjad> vector = pitchtools.get_interval_class_vector(pitches)
abjad> for i in range(7):
...     print '\t%s\t%s' % (i, vector[i])
... 
   0  12
   1  9
   2  18
   3  9
   4  9
   5  9
   6  0
